scenario_text.value: I see... So that was a fake Shakomon.
But it looked just like her...

Yeah, but the real one would never say things
like that, right?
Right! Shakomon would never be so cruel!

Even though I knew it in my head, hearing her
say it to my face left me speechless...

Don’t worry. If the words won’t come to you,
I’ll tell her off for you.

I’m not scared of any stupid Shakomon faker
as long as you’re around, Takuma!
